    • onTownDeleted

      public void onTownDeleted(DeleteTownEvent event)
      Handles recently-created towns getting a refund when they are deleted.
      Parameters:
      event - DeleteTownEvent to listen to.

    • onBedExplodeEvent

      public void onBedExplodeEvent(BedExplodeEvent event)
      Runs when a bed or respawn anchor explodes that we can track them in the BlockExplodeEvent, which always returns AIR for that event's getBlock().
      Parameters:
      event - BedExplodeEvent

    • onTownLeaveNation

      public void onTownLeaveNation(NationPreTownLeaveEvent event)

    • onPlayerDamagePlayerEvent

      public void onPlayerDamagePlayerEvent(TownyPlayerDamagePlayerEvent event)

    • onPlayerSpawnsWithTown

      public void onPlayerSpawnsWithTown(SpawnEvent event)
      Used to deny outlawed players spawning into Towns they are enemied in.
      Parameters:
      event - SpawnEvent which ResidentSpawnEvent, TownSpawnEvent, NationSpawnEvent extend.

    • onPlayerSpawnToTown

      public void onPlayerSpawnToTown(SuccessfulTownyTeleportEvent event)
      Used to display a message to the mayor and assistants of a town, alerting them to someone spawning at their town when money is earned by the town.
      Parameters:
      event - SuccessfulTownyTeleportEvent thrown when someone spawns to town.

    • onTownUnclaim

      public void onTownUnclaim(TownPreUnclaimCmdEvent event)
      Used to prevent unclaiming when there is an outsider in the TownBlock, and the config does not allow for this.
      Parameters:
      event - TownPreUnclaimCmdEvent thrown when someone runs /t unclaim.

    • onTownUnclaimDistrict

      public void onTownUnclaimDistrict(TownPreUnclaimEvent event)
      Used to prevent unclaiming when a District would be cut in two parts.
      Parameters:
      event - TownPreUnclaimEvent thrown when someone runs /t unclaim.

    • onTownClaim

      public void onTownClaim(TownClaimEvent event)
      Used to warn towns when they're approaching their claim limit, when the takeoverclaim feature is enabled, as well as claiming particles.
      Parameters:
      event - TownClaimEvent.

    • onTownLosesResident

      public void onTownLosesResident(TownRemoveResidentEvent event)
      Used to warn towns when they've lost a resident, so they know they're at risk of having claims stolen in the takeoverclaim feature. Used for town_level and nation_level decrease events.
      Parameters:
      event - TownRemoveResidentEvent.

    • onChunkNotification

      public void onChunkNotification(ChunkNotificationEvent event)
      Used to inform players they can /t takeoverclaim a plot when they enter towns that are overclaimed.
      Parameters:
      event - ChunkNotificationEvent thrown by Towny to construct the chunk notifications.

      public void onResidentPreJoinTown(TownPreAddResidentEvent event)
